isis.stitle: INSTRUMENTS - 1000 SERIES - REMOVE AND INSTALL - INSTRUMENT CLUSTER COMPONENTS

item.para: The instrument cluster can be broken down to the front panel, rear panel and the printed circuit assembly ( Figure 3).
Light bulbs on the printed circuit assembly can be replaced after removing the rear panel.
The individual gauges are not replaceable. A gauge failure warrants printed circuit assembly replacement.

figure.caption: Front Panel, Rear Panel, Printed Circuit Assembly

svcsubproc.title: Removal of the Printed Circuit Assembly

step1.para: Place the removed cluster face down on a clean horizontal surface. Remove the six mounting screws from the rear panel and set it aside.
Remove the six mounting screws from the printed circuit assembly.
Disconnect the flex circuit connector for the front overlay and gently pull the board away from the front panel housing.

svcsubproc.title: Panel Lamp Replacement
svcsubproc.para: The panel lamp bulbs are the push-in type and are mounted in a twist lock receptacle ( Figure 3). The rear panel must be removed to gain access to the lamps.
